description: Rafael Alencar gives a whole new meaning to “boss top,” and his is the truest of definitions. When you’re in any situation with Rafael, he’s in charge, and that’s doubly so when it’s the bedroom. Ben Batmen is a cocky young executive who thinks he owns the world, but if he’s going to make his way through the white-collar world, Rafael Alencar isn’t going to take it easy on him. He’s going to make Ben work long and hard for his promotion, and that means getting his ass hammered by Rafael’s 10 inches of fat, uncut Brazilian cock -- and it’s all bareback all the time!
title: Rafael Alencar Destroys Ben Batemen’s Ass
